name: Miguel & Ramona
description:
This game is all about cooperative gaming, Miguel and Ramona care a lot for each other, but suddenly Miguel falls into a cave. Ramona in just a blink of an eye decides to follow him into this misterious place full off misteries.

Already in the cave, there was a question to be asked, what do we do now? Instead of just waiting, they decided to escape by collaborating with each other.

Controls:

Left / Right Arrows : Move Miguel

Up Arrow: Jump with Miguel

A / D: Move Ramona

W: Jump with Ramona

Space: Kick with Ramona

M: Mute

R: Restart Level

Credits:

Alejandro Monascal

Hector Vargas

José Guerrero

Luis Pulido

Miguel Giménez

Isaac López

Noel Ramírez

Adrian Lovera

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2015 (http://globalgamejam.org/2015/...)
